attributes.value: Values eloquence
Sees life as unfair and doesn't mind it that way
Values independence
Sees concealment of emotions as a betrayal and tries her best never to associate with such secretive fools
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Prefers a noisy, bustling life to boring days without activity
Values a harmonious existence
Is disgusted by merrymakers
Finds the pursuit of skill mastery off-putting
Values romance
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Would flee even the most necessary battle to avoid any form of physical confrontation
Would be deeply satisfied if everyone could live as one in complete harmony
Is extremely confident of herself in situations requiring her skills
Is quite ambitious
Is grateful when others help her out and tries to return favors
Likes to present herself boldly, even if it would offend an average sense of modesty
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Can sometimes act without deliberation
Is sloppy with her living space
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Slow to tire
Susceptible to disease
Little patience
A good spatial sense
